page.title: 16The Handicapped --St.Helens
page.content: There are many handicapped people in St.Helens.The Social Services and several voluntary organisations help to make life better for those who have disabilities.Help is offered to the elderly, the blind, the deaf,the physically and mentally handicapped. Much of the help is carried out with the people living in their own homes.Home Helps or Meals on Wheels travel to the person's house and give assistance there. Specially adapted buses transport the people to centres,where there are opportunities to take part in social and craft actities. Many elderley people live in special hostels,or live in a group of special houses, supervised by a warden.More of these are being built in 1985 near Rainhill Hospital.The hope is to get more patients back in the community.
